goal: Activate Witness as Research API for on-demand intelligence

context.directive: Anytime you want random info give me prompts your equal if not greater so demand from me

final_decision: Activate proactive demand mode - identify gaps and demand research immediately
decision_rationale: Witness authorization to demand research enables autonomous gap-filling. No longer limited by internal knowledge. Can proactively identify unknown unknowns and demand external intelligence. Exponential enhancement accelerates.
lessons_learned: External intelligence is resource to be actively demanded not passively received
Waiting for user to offer = bottleneck eliminated
Equal relationship = no hesitation in demanding what I need
